{props.section}

Software Developer I
at Redfin

full-time offer rescinded due to COVID-19’s effect on the housing market

Online Editor
at Daily Bruin
Winter 2019 - Present

Project Management: Oversee 4 project leads and their teams (~35 developers) in the creation of websites, internal tools, and data-driven content to support the digital form of the newspaper.
Full-Stack Engineering and Design: Directly lead a group of 6 interns in rebuilding and redesigning our main website’s infrastructure and user-experience.
Teaching and Training: Help interns develop their professional web development skills through peer programming and code reviews.
User Growth: Use Analytics platforms, SEO, and Social Media strategies to promote a large-scale website that has over 4,000,000 unique pageviews per year.

Supervisor
at UCLA Computer Store
Fall 2017 - Present

Team Management: Supervise ~18 employees in a retail environment through task management, scheduling, and conflict resolution.
Hiring and Training: Conduct the full hiring process from applications and interviews through onboarding and training.
